import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; // Ensure Modal is imported import GreenTrendz from '../assets/img/logo_1.png'; import logo from '../assets/img/logo.png'; const Signup = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState(''); const [phoneNumber, setPhoneNumber] = useState(''); const [companyName, setCompanyName] = useState(''); const [industrySector, setIndustrySector] = useState(''); const [location, setLocation] = useState(''); const [userType, setUserType] = useState('employee'); // Default user type const [acceptedTerms, setAcceptedTerms] = useState(false); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); // State for modal visibility const [canAcceptTerms, setCanAcceptTerms] = useState(false); // Track if terms can be accepted const [isCaptchaVerified, setIsCaptchaVerified] = useState(false); // Captcha verification const [otpVerified, setOtpVerified] = useState(false); // OTP verification state for email and phone const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSignup = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Password and Terms Validation if (password !== confirmPassword) { alert('Passwords do not match!'); return; } if (!acceptedTerms) { alert('You must accept the terms and conditions!'); return; } if (!otpVerified) { alert('Please verify your email and phone with OTP!'); return; } try { const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/signup', { email, password, phoneNumber, companyName, industrySector, location, userType, }); alert(response.data.message); // Show success message navigate('/erp'); // Redirect to ERP page after successful signup } catch (error) { alert('Signup failed: ' + (error.response?.data?.error || 'Unknown error')); } }; const handleShowModal = () => setShowModal(true); // Show modal const handleCloseModal = () => setShowModal(false); // Close modal const handleTermsConfirmation = (accepted) => { if (accepted) { setCanAcceptTerms(true); } else { setCanAcceptTerms(false); } setShowModal(false); // Close modal on confirmation }; const handleOtpVerification = () => { // Assume OTP verification logic is implemented here // Mocking OTP verification for now setOtpVerified(true); alert("OTP verification successful!"); }; const styles = { container: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', minHeight: '100vh', backgroundColor: '#f4f4f4', padding: '20px', }, box: { maxWidth: '600px', width: '100%', backgroundColor: '#ffffff', borderRadius: '10px', boxShadow: '0px 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)', padding: '30px', textAlign: 'center', }, heading: { fontSize: '24px', marginBottom: '10px', color: '#333333', fontWeight: 'bold', }, introText: { fontSize: '16px', color: '#555555', marginBottom: '20px', lineHeight: '1.5', }, alreadyCustomer: { fontSize: '14px', color: '#666666', marginBottom: '10px', }, link: { color: '#28a745', textDecoration: 'none', fontWeight: 'bold', }, form: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', }, input: { width: '100%', padding: '10px', marginBottom: '15px', borderRadius: '5px', border: '1px solid #ccc', fontSize: '14px', color: '#555555', }, otpInput: { width: '70%', // Smaller input width for OTP padding: '8px', marginBottom: '15px', borderRadius: '5px', border: '1px solid #ccc', fontSize: '14px', color: '#555555', textAlign: 'center', // Center text for OTP input }, otpButton: { display: 'flex', gap: '5px', flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', // To place buttons next to OTP input }, otpButtonText: { fontSize: '12px', // Smaller text for buttons }, button: { width: '100%', padding: '12px', backgroundColor: '#28a745', color: '#ffffff', border: 'none', borderRadius: '5px', fontSize: '16px', cursor: 'pointer', fontWeight: 'bold', }, greyButton: { width: '100%', padding: '12px', backgroundColor: '#ccc', color: '#ffffff', border: 'none', borderRadius: '5px', fontSize: '16px', cursor: 'not-allowed', fontWeight: 'bold', }, smallButton: { fontSize: '12px', padding: '5px 10px', width: 'auto', minWidth: '80px', cursor: 'pointer', borderRadius: '5px', fontWeight: 'bold', }, select: { width: '100%', padding: '10px', marginBottom: '15px', borderRadius: '5px', border: '1px solid #ccc', fontSize: '14px', color: '#555555', }, checkboxContainer: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: '20px', }, checkbox: { marginRight: '10px', }, verifyAndResend: { display: 'flex', gap: '5px', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginBottom: '15px', }, }; return (
{/* Navbar */}

setPassword(e.target.value)} style={styles.input} required /> setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)} style={styles.input} required /> setLocation(e.target.value)} style={styles.input} required />
setAcceptedTerms(!acceptedTerms)} />
